text: @PressSec @Twitter There is a pandemic and it is literally not safe to gather in large groups. You need to be tried in court @ICCT_TheHague with Trump for deliberately sending people to their death of Covid19. @WHO @jack @SpeakerPelosi @UNHumanRights #NeverAgain #NeverForget https://t.co/oE4kePHsdS
